title: Did comedy Steve Harvey commend President Trump as politically incorrect "investigator"?
subtitle: Facebook users assigned an unusual resemblance of "Raccoons" to Steve Harvey in early 2019. But which Steve Harvey?
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The comedian and broadcaster Steve Harvey once praised Donald Trump as the faulty but effective president who had been employed to "get rid" of democratic and republican parties, as well as undocumented migrants.
